text: @senatemajldr You should have come together three years ago and not blame Obama and China.  You cut the Pandemic Team. You refused the W.H.O. test kits, you called it a hoax when you knew about in December all the way through two weeks ago. Rot in your sweat. I hope karma kisses your a** good.
